titleStmt.title: A letter from a minister in His Excellence his army, to a brother of his in London, by way of prevention to Mercurius Aulicus and his complices. Dated from my lord generalls quarter before Reading. April 18. 1643.
titleStmt.author: Bowles, Edward, 1613-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Rothwell, and S. Gellibrand,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
